Package org.cibseven.bpm.engine.test.assertions

Class ProcessEngineTests

java.lang.Object
org.cibseven.bpm.engine.test.assertions.bpmn.AbstractAssertions
org.cibseven.bpm.engine.test.assertions.bpmn.BpmnAwareTests
org.cibseven.bpm.engine.test.assertions.cmmn.CmmnAwareTests
org.cibseven.bpm.engine.test.assertions.ProcessEngineTests
public class ProcessEngineTests extends CmmnAwareTests
Convenience class to access all available Camunda Platform related Assertions PLUS helper methods. Use it with a static import: import static org.cibseven.bpm.engine.test.assertions.ProcessEngineTests.*;
See Also:
